Failed Assertion Image.

Assuming you have a HTTP Request element that has a few child Response Assertions elements:

E.g:

|- Http Request
  |__
     |- Response Assertion 1
     |- Response Assertion 2
     |- Response Assertion 3

If "Response Assertion 1" or "Response Assertion 2" are failing, but "Response Assertion 3" is passing, the results will show up as "GREEN" in a View Results Tree element (or 0% Error in Aggregate Report element). Still, within the "View Results Tree" the request has the expand node switch, and if this is expanded, the failed assertion is shown in red.

This is very confusing and can cause validation mistakes.
